dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2206 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on distributions from 529 accounts for qualified higher education expenses.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schmitt introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on distributions from 529 accounts for qualified higher education expenses.

section.header: Increase in limitation for qualified higher education expenses from 529 accounts

subsection.text: The last sentence of section 529(e)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $10,000 and inserting $20,000.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
